official_title: A bill to grant the consent of Congress to the city of Boston to construct, maintain and operate a causeway and fixed-span bridge in and over Fort Point Channel, Boston, Massachusetts.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Grants the consent of Congress to the city of Boston to construct, maintain, and operate a fixed-span bridge in and over Fort Point Channel, Boston, Massachusetts. Requires approval for the location and plans of such bridge from the Secretary of Transportation.

titles.title: A bill to grant the consent of Congress to the city of Boston to construct, maintain and operate a causeway and fixed-span bridge in and over Fort Point Channel, Boston, Massachusetts.
